abstract: Creates the default configuration for unavailable content.
overview:
## Return Value

A new configuration.

## Discussion

Use this method to create a new configuration to customize. This is useful if your empty content doesn’t fit the uses covered by configurations available with [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentUnavailableConfiguration-swift.struct/search()] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentUnavailableConfiguration-swift.struct/loading()].

# empty()

**Type Method**

Creates the default configuration for unavailable content.

## Declaration

```swift
static func empty() -> UIContentUnavailableConfiguration
```

## Return Value

A new configuration.

## Discussion

Use this method to create a new configuration to customize. This is useful if your empty content doesn’t fit the uses covered by configurations available with [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentUnavailableConfiguration-swift.struct/search()] or [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIContentUnavailableConfiguration-swift.struct/loading()].
title: empty()
